amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. Not more than $10,000,000,000 of the funds made available by this Act may be used for United States military operations in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 232 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the use of funds for the United States military operations in Afghanistan to no more than $10,000,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 331 (Roll no. 91).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 331 (Roll no. 91).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A083) offered by Mr. Nadler.
